main_definition: Exclusively; solely; no others present or involved.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to the exclusivity of something, meaning there is nothing else like it in a given context.
meanings_and_examples.example: She was born and raised only in New York City.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicates that no additional options or choices are available beyond what has been mentioned.
meanings_and_examples.example: You can have either the apple pie or the cherry tart, but not both. It's just apple pie or only cherry tart for dessert.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expresses limitation by stating that there is nothing else available besides what has been mentioned.
meanings_and_examples.example: After using all my money on groceries, I can afford to buy only a movie ticket today.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in emphasis to stress that something stands out or should be taken seriously because there are no other comparable entities.
meanings_and_examples.example: Only you have the courage to stand up for what is right.
